title: Kelanganne Kelunga Lyrics Vadacurry Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kelanganne Kelunga
Singer(s): Gana Bala
Movie: Vadacurry
Music: Vivek Shiva & Mervin Solomon
Lyrics: Lalith Anand

Kelanganne Kelunga Kelunga
kettukitte irunga
oorasuthi voottanda roattaanga
ulla kadhainga.

Love matter-u, life matter-u
ellamey kandha story.
Tamil Naattula pala peru irukkaan
irukkaan ivana madhiri..

Onnu rendu moonu number irukku
cyber-ukku kooda value irukku.
Vazhaikaiyila veenaa tension edhukku.
natputhaaney nalla tonic-u

Suzhaludhu joraa boomi urunda
thiruppathi pona laddu urunda.
yezhaikku yeththa ellu urunda
kidaichaale podhum.

Raockettu mela, raja rani pola
sevvaayila plottu poda
paarkkudhu oru koottam.

Rocket pogum mela paathu
nippaan yezha.
diwalikku seattu poda
yengum oru koottam.

Ye apple phone-u android phone-u
ullavan pala peru.
ada post card-ayum pongal vazhkaiyum
paarkkala sila peru.

Weekend aanaa, ECR roadu
party enna bandha enna
ayyyo alaiyudhunga.

Meiyaalumey meiyaalumey
sandhosam edhuda edhuda.
podhumena ellaarum nenacha
kidakkum inbam thaanada..

Onnu rendu moonu number irukku
cyber-ukku kooda value irukku.
Vazhaikaiyila veenaa tension edhukku.
natputhaaney nalla tonic-u

Suzhaludhu joraa boomi urunda
thiruppathi pona laddu urunda.
yezhaikku yeththa ellu urunda
kidaichaale podhum.

AVM gemini, manasuthaana gavani
ponna paartha paiyanoda
kannum kadha sollum.
Baby albert devi
maha rani shanthi.
lifee oru theater thaanda
nenachaa padamaagum.

Ye kannum kannum pesikkitta
edhukku i-phone-u .
love pannum ponnu sirichaa podhum
adhuthaan ring tone-u.

Nam vazhkka kooda share-auto pola
nallathayum kettathayum share
pannudaa eppodhum..

Un vazhkka thaan un kaiyila
sonnaaru super star-u.
Urchaagamaa munneru namma life
romba superu..

Onnu rendu moonu number irukku
cyber-ukku kooda value irukku.
Vazhaikaiyila veenaa tension edhukku.
natputhaaney nalla tonic-u.

Suzhaludhu joraa boomi urunda
thiruppathi pona laddu urunda.
yezhaikku yeththa ellu urunda
kidaichaale podhum.
